c74object.name: fftjit.bin2freq
c74object.digest: Create FFTJIT matrices from incoming audio
c74object.description: FFT implimentation through pfft~. This object must be opened in pfft for it to function.

inlet.description: Bin Number will convert to frequency

objarg.name: windowSize
objarg.digest: Size of the full FFT window
objarg.description: Size of the full FFT window

method.name: windowSize
method.digest: Size of the full FFT window
method.description: Size of the full FFT window

method.name: FFTJIT Matrix
method.digest: get size of the full FFT window the matrix represents
method.description: Set size of the full FFT window the matrix represents
